reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Contribution 2021 to the Bilateral Emergency Fund with IFRC

description.narrative: Contribution to the Bilateral Emergency Fund with IFRC for the year 2021, to support emergency appeals and response funds launched by IFRC in response to climate related hazards
Rifinanziamento Fondo Bilaterale Emergenza presso FICROSS /IFRC per l'anno 2021 per rispondere agli appelli e fondi di prima risposta lanciati da FICROSS per eventi calamitosi.

tag.narrative: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries
